rules: Rule1: If the box office is profitable from the opening weekend, then either the awards have been nominated for best picture or, provided that the project has not been greenlit by the film studio, marketing has been finalized with a press tour.
Rule2: Whenever the sequel has been cancelled for the franchise, then the release has not been delayed for the theatrical run.
Rule3: Under the condition that the budget has been approved for special effects, it is not the case that the vehicle scene has the animal character in the script.

Rule4: Provided that post-production has been completed for visual effects, then either a celebrity has been hired for a cameo role or, if filming has been scheduled for a location shoot, then, whenever the project has not been greenlit by the film studio, the budget has been approved for special effects.
Rule5: Post-production has been completed for visual effects or the premiere is ready for the red carpet.

Rule6: If the premiere is ready for the red carpet, then either a celebrity has been hired for a cameo role or, should filming be scheduled for a location shoot, then, provided that the project has not been greenlit by the film studio, the budget has been approved for special effects.
Rule7: Under the condition that marketing has been finalized with a press tour, distribution has been secured with a streaming deal.

Rule8: If it is not the case that the box office not being profitable from the opening weekend implies the sequel has been cancelled for the franchise, then the studio is bankrupt for the production company.
Rule9: Should the box office not be profitable from the opening weekend, then the release has been delayed for the theatrical run.
Rule10: Provided that the project has not been greenlit by the film studio, the vehicle scene has the animal character in the script.
facts: Fact1: Filming has been scheduled for a location shoot.
Fact2: It is not the case that the studio is bankrupt for the production company.
Fact3: A celebrity has not been hired for a cameo role.
Fact4: Distribution has not been secured with a streaming deal.
Fact5: The awards have not been nominated for best picture.

question: The project has been greenlit by the film studio.
